Articles.Content:
I'm making a Minmus base and have completely ran out of ideas for stuff to put their. So far I have a space station, 2 hab modules (More will be on the way) 4 robotic rovers and a lander to ferry Kerbals from the space station to the ground. Any suggestions for things to add to the bass or station are welcome. Submissions are welcome with open arms ;P

Thanks <3
I'd build a really tall communications tower, the Kerbals stationed there will need their daytime tv fix

How about an experiment platform? Put some sciency-looking stuff (like batteries, antennae, and science equipment) on some kind of flat surface, then put it on top of a small surface tower/dock it to the space station. If you want, put some ladders on it so that Kerbals can check the progress of their research.
If its on one of the lakes build a rover terminal unless you don't have a standard docking height.sending mine up after testing.

Maybe a 'building' with an observation deck? Kerbals can look at the stars from a balcony. Or you could build some sort of ice/salt core sampling mechanism? Put a couple trusses vertically and surround it with machinery/sciencey stuff?

Don't have docking ports on my current rovers but I am planning on sending at least 1 manned rover up there so I might have a look at making a terminal. Communications tower.... not sure how I never thought of that ._. How else will they watch Kerbs on ice without looking out of their window and using... energy *shudders* but I definitely like that experiment platform and observation tower although I may have to build the tower in orbit because I like to go wild on a... limited... laptop Thanks for the suggestions though!
No problem! Have fun with the base
Problems with energy? Build dedicated power unit. A combination of trusses, solar panels of various types, and some RTGs for the night.
